insert.id: create高額介護サービス費給付対象者一時TBL

mapper.insert: CREATE TEMP TABLE "DbWT3054KogakuKyufuTaishosha" ( "renban" smallint, "recordNo" smallint, "recordShubetsu" character varying(2), "shokisaiHokenshaNo" rgdb."DbUDD003HokenshaNo", "shokisaiHokenshaMei" character varying(50), "sakuseiYmd" rshare."UDD015YMD", "kokuhoRengokaiMei" character varying(50), "tsuchishoNo" character varying(6), "serviceTeikyoYm" rshare."UDD014YM", "jigyoshoNo" rgdb."DbUDD004JigyoshaNo", "jigyoshoMei" character varying(40), "serviceShuruiCode" rgdb."DbUDD005ServiceShuruiCode", "serviceShuruiName" character varying(40), "serviceHiyoGokeigaku" numeric(13,0), "riyoshaFutangaku" numeric(13,0), "biko" character varying(20), "serviceHiyoGokeigakuGokei" numeric(13,0), "riyoshaFutangakuGokei" numeric(13,0), "santeiKijungaku" numeric(13,0), "shiharaizumigakuGokei" numeric(13,0), "kogakuShiharaigaku" numeric(13,0), "shinseizumiFlag" boolean )

insert.id: 高額介護サービス費給付対象者一時TBLに登録

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "DbWT3054KogakuKyufuTaishosha" VALUES ( #{連番}, #{レコード番号}, #{帳票レコード種別}, #{証記載保険者番号}, #{証記載保険者名}, #{作成年月日}, #{国保連合会名}, #{no}, #{サービス提供年月}, #{事業所番号}, #{事業所名}, #{サービス種類コード}, #{サービス種類名}, #{サービス費用合計額}, #{利用者負担額}, #{備考}, #{サービス費用合計額合計}, #{利用者負担額合計}, #{算定基準額}, #{支払済金額合計}, #{高額支給額}, #{再処理不可フラグ} )

INSERT INTO "DbWT0001Hihokensha" VALUES ( #{連番}, #{証記載保険者番号}, #{被保険者番号}, #{サービス提供年月末日}, #{被保険者カナ氏名}, #{被保険者氏名}, #{旧市町村コード}, #{変換被保険者番号}, #{登録被保険者番号}, #{市町村コード}, #{管内管外区分}, #{郵便番号}, #{町域コード}, #{行政区コード}, #{行政区名}, #{住所}, #{番地}, #{方書}, #{宛名カナ名称}, #{宛名名称}, #{氏名50音カナ}, #{資格取得日}, #{資格取得事由コード}, #{資格喪失日}, #{資格喪失事由コード}, #{世帯集約番号}, #{識別コード} )

insert.id: 処理結果リスト一時TBLに登録

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "DbWT0002KokuhorenTorikomiError" VALUES ( #{エラー区分}, #{証記載保険者番号}, #{被保険者番号}, #{キー1}, #{キー2}, #{キー3}, #{キー4}, #{キー5}, #{被保険者カナ氏名}, #{被保険者氏名}, #{備考} )

update.id: 高額介護サービス費給付対象者一時TBLに再処理不可登録

select.id: select高額介護サービス費給付対象者一時TBLの全件
select世帯集約番号関連リスト

mapper.select:
SELECT ,
FROM "DbWT0001Hihokensha" AS DbWT0001 LEFT JOIN "rgdb"."DbT3004KyodoShoriyoJukyushaIdoKogakuSofu" ON DbWT0001."henkanHihokenshaNo" = "DbT3004KyodoShoriyoJukyushaIdoKogakuSofu"."hiHokenshaNo" WHERE DbWT0001."henkanHihokenshaNo" IS NOT NULL AND DbWT0001."henkanHihokenshaNo" != '' AND "DbT3004KyodoShoriyoJukyushaIdoKogakuSofu"."idoYMD"<= DbWT0001."serviceTeikyoYmd" AND "DbT3004KyodoShoriyoJukyushaIdoKogakuSofu"."logicalDeletedFlag"= false ORDER BY "DbT3004KyodoShoriyoJukyushaIdoKogakuSofu"."idoYMD" DESC , "DbT3004KyodoShoriyoJukyushaIdoKogakuSofu"."rirekiNo" DESC

select.id: 合計再処理対象データの取得

mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM "rgdb"."DbT3055KogakuKyufuTaishoshaGokei" WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 'X' FROM "rgdb"."DbT3056KogakuShikyuShinsei" AS 申請TBL WHERE "DbT3055KogakuKyufuTaishoshaGokei"."hihokenshaNo" = 申請TBL."hihokenshaNo" AND "DbT3055KogakuKyufuTaishoshaGokei"."serviceTeikyoYM" = 申請TBL."serviceTeikyoYM" AND "DbT3055KogakuKyufuTaishoshaGokei"."rirekiNo" = 申請TBL."rirekiNo" ) AND "DbT3055KogakuKyufuTaishoshaGokei"."tashoshaUketoriYM" = #{処理年月}

select.id: 明細再処理対象データの取得

mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM "rgdb"."DbT3054KogakuKyufuTaishoshaMeisai" WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 'X' FROM "rgdb"."DbT3056KogakuShikyuShinsei" AS 申請TBL WHERE "DbT3054KogakuKyufuTaishoshaMeisai"."hihokenshaNo" = 申請TBL."hihokenshaNo" AND "DbT3054KogakuKyufuTaishoshaMeisai"."serviceTeikyoYM" = 申請TBL."serviceTeikyoYM" AND "DbT3054KogakuKyufuTaishoshaMeisai"."rirekiNo" = 申請TBL."rirekiNo" ) AND "DbT3054KogakuKyufuTaishoshaMeisai"."taishoshaUketoriYM" = #{処理年月}

select.id: 再処理不可データの取得

mapper.select: SELECT 合計TBL."hihokenshaNo",合計TBL."serviceTeikyoYM",MAX(合計TBL."rirekiNo") AS rirekiNo FROM "DbWT3054KogakuKyufuTaishosha" AS 一時TBL INNER JOIN "DbWT0001Hihokensha" AS 被保険者一時TBL ON 一時TBL."renban" = 被保険者一時TBL."meisaiRenban" INNER JOIN rgdb."DbT3055KogakuKyufuTaishoshaGokei" AS 合計TBL ON 被保険者一時TBL."hihokenshaNo" = 合計TBL."hihokenshaNo" AND 一時TBL."serviceTeikyoYm" = 合計TBL."serviceTeikyoYM" AND 一時TBL."shinseizumiFlag"= false GROUP BY 合計TBL."hihokenshaNo", 合計TBL."serviceTeikyoYM"

SELECT ,
FROM "DbWT3054KogakuKyufuTaishosha" AS 対象者TBL INNER JOIN "DbWT0001Hihokensha" AS DbWT0001 ON 対象者TBL."renban" = DbWT0001."meisaiRenban" WHERE 対象者TBL."shinseizumiFlag" = false AND 対象者TBL."recordShubetsu" = #{帳票レコード種別}

SELECT ,
FROM "DbWT3054KogakuKyufuTaishosha" AS 対象者TBL INNER JOIN "DbWT0001Hihokensha" AS DbWT0001 ON 対象者TBL."renban" = DbWT0001."meisaiRenban" WHERE 対象者TBL."shinseizumiFlag" = false ${出力順}

result.property: サービス費用合計額合計
result.column: dbWT3054_サービス費用合計額合計

mapper.sql: DbWT0001."meisaiRenban" AS "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_meisaiRenban", DbWT0001."shoHokenshaNo" AS "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_shoHokenshaNo", DbWT0001."orgHihokenshaNo" AS "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_orgHihokenshaNo", DbWT0001."serviceTeikyoYmd" AS "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_serviceTeikyoYmd", DbWT0001."orgHihokenshaKanaShimei" AS "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_orgHihokenshaKanaShimei", DbWT0001."orgHihokenshaShimei" AS "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_orgHihokenshaShimei", DbWT0001."oldShichosonCode" AS "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_oldShichosonCode", DbWT0001."henkanHihokenshaNo" AS "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_henkanHihokenshaNo", DbWT0001."hihokenshaNo" AS "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_hihokenshaNo", DbWT0001."shichosonCode" AS "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_shichosonCode", DbWT0001."KannaiKangaiKubun" AS "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_kannaiKangaiKubun", DbWT0001."yubinNo" AS "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_yubinNo", DbWT0001."choikiCode" AS "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_choikiCode", DbWT0001."gyoseikuCode" AS "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_gyoseikuCode", DbWT0001."gyoseikuMei" AS "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_gyoseikuMei", DbWT0001."jusho" AS "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_jusho", DbWT0001."banchi" AS "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_banchi", DbWT0001."katagaki" AS "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_katagaki", DbWT0001."kanaMeisho" AS "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_kanaMeisho", DbWT0001."meisho" AS "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_meisho", DbWT0001."shimei50onKana" AS "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_shimei50onKana", DbWT0001."shikakuShutokuYmd" AS "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_shikakuShutokuYmd", DbWT0001."shikakuShutokuJiyuCode" AS "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_shikakuShutokuJiyuCode", DbWT0001."shikakuSoshitsuYmd" AS "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_shikakuSoshitsuYmd", DbWT0001."shikakuSoshitsuJiyuCode" AS "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_shikakuSoshitsuJiyuCode", DbWT0001."setaiShuyakuNo" AS "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_setaiShuyakuNo", DbWT0001."shikibetsuCode" AS "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_shikibetsuCode"

対象者TBL."renban" AS "dbWT3054_連番", 対象者TBL."recordNo" AS "dbWT3054_レコード番号", 対象者TBL."recordShubetsu" AS "dbWT3054_帳票レコード種別", 対象者TBL."shokisaiHokenshaNo" AS "dbWT3054_証記載保険者番号", 対象者TBL."shokisaiHokenshaMei" AS "dbWT3054_証記載保険者名", 対象者TBL."sakuseiYmd" AS "dbWT3054_作成年月日", 対象者TBL."kokuhoRengokaiMei" AS "dbWT3054_国保連合会名", 対象者TBL."tsuchishoNo" AS "dbWT3054_no", 対象者TBL."serviceTeikyoYm" AS "dbWT3054_サービス提供年月", 対象者TBL."jigyoshoNo" AS "dbWT3054_事業所番号", 対象者TBL."jigyoshoMei" AS "dbWT3054_事業所名", 対象者TBL."serviceShuruiCode" AS "dbWT3054_サービス種類コード", 対象者TBL."serviceShuruiName" AS "dbWT3054_サービス種類名", 対象者TBL."serviceHiyoGokeigaku" AS "dbWT3054_サービス費用合計額", 対象者TBL."riyoshaFutangaku" AS "dbWT3054_利用者負担額", 対象者TBL."biko" AS "dbWT3054_備考", 対象者TBL."serviceHiyoGokeigakuGokei" AS "dbWT3054_サービス費用合計額合計", 対象者TBL."riyoshaFutangakuGokei" AS "dbWT3054_利用者負担額合計", 対象者TBL."santeiKijungaku" AS "dbWT3054_算定基準額", 対象者TBL."shiharaizumigakuGokei" AS "dbWT3054_支払済金額合計", 対象者TBL."kogakuShiharaigaku" AS "dbWT3054_高額支給額", 対象者TBL."shinseizumiFlag" AS "dbWT3054_再処理不可フラグ"

"dbWT3054_連番", "dbWT3054_レコード番号", "dbWT3054_帳票レコード種別", "dbWT3054_証記載保険者番号", "dbWT3054_証記載保険者名", "dbWT3054_作成年月日", "dbWT3054_国保連合会名", "dbWT3054_no", "dbWT3054_サービス提供年月", "dbWT3054_事業所番号", "dbWT3054_事業所名", "dbWT3054_サービス種類コード", "dbWT3054_サービス種類名", "dbWT3054_サービス費用合計額", "dbWT3054_利用者負担額", "dbWT3054_備考", "dbWT3054_サービス費用合計額合計", "dbWT3054_利用者負担額合計", "dbWT3054_算定基準額", "dbWT3054_支払済金額合計", "dbWT3054_高額支給額", "dbWT3054_再処理不可フラグ", "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_meisaiRenban", "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_shoHokenshaNo", "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_orgHihokenshaNo", "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_serviceTeikyoYmd", "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_orgHihokenshaKanaShimei", "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_orgHihokenshaShimei", "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_oldShichosonCode", "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_henkanHihokenshaNo", "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_hihokenshaNo", "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_shichosonCode", "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_kannaiKangaiKubun", "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_yubinNo", "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_choikiCode", "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_gyoseikuCode", "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_gyoseikuMei", "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_jusho", "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_banchi", "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_katagaki", "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_kanaMeisho", "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_meisho", "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_shimei50onKana", "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_shikakuShutokuYmd", "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_shikakuShutokuJiyuCode", "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_shikakuSoshitsuYmd", "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_shikakuSoshitsuJiyuCode", "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_setaiShuyakuNo", "dbWT0001HihokenshaTemp_shikibetsuCode"

HIHOKENSHA."hihokenshaNo" as HIHOKENSHA_hihokenshaNo, HIHOKENSHA."idoYMD" as HIHOKENSHA_idoYMD, HIHOKENSHA."edaNo" as HIHOKENSHA_edaNo, HIHOKENSHA."idoJiyuCode" as HIHOKENSHA_idoJiyuCode, HIHOKENSHA."shichosonCode" as HIHOKENSHA_shichosonCode, HIHOKENSHA."shikibetsuCode" as HIHOKENSHA_shikibetsuCode, HIHOKENSHA."shikakuShutokuJiyuCode" as HIHOKENSHA_shikakuShutokuJiyuCode, HIHOKENSHA."shikakuShutokuYMD" as HIHOKENSHA_shikakuShutokuYMD, HIHOKENSHA."shikakuShutokuTodokedeYMD" as HIHOKENSHA_shikakuShutokuTodokedeYMD, HIHOKENSHA."ichigoShikakuShutokuYMD" as HIHOKENSHA_ichigoShikakuShutokuYMD, HIHOKENSHA."hihokennshaKubunCode" as HIHOKENSHA_hihokennshaKubunCode, HIHOKENSHA."shikakuSoshitsuJiyuCode" as HIHOKENSHA_shikakuSoshitsuJiyuCode, HIHOKENSHA."shikakuSoshitsuYMD" as HIHOKENSHA_shikakuSoshitsuYMD, HIHOKENSHA."shikakuSoshitsuTodokedeYMD" as HIHOKENSHA_shikakuSoshitsuTodokedeYMD, HIHOKENSHA."shikakuHenkoJiyuCode" as HIHOKENSHA_shikakuHenkoJiyuCode, HIHOKENSHA."shikakuHenkoYMD" as HIHOKENSHA_shikakuHenkoYMD, HIHOKENSHA."shikakuHenkoTodokedeYMD" as HIHOKENSHA_shikakuHenkoTodokedeYMD, HIHOKENSHA."jushochitokureiTekiyoJiyuCode" as HIHOKENSHA_jushochitokureiTekiyoJiyuCode, HIHOKENSHA."jushochitokureiTekiyoYMD" as HIHOKENSHA_jushochitokureiTekiyoYMD, HIHOKENSHA."jushochitokureiTekiyoTodokedeYMD" as HIHOKENSHA_jushochitokureiTekiyoTodokedeYMD, HIHOKENSHA."jushochitokureiKaijoJiyuCode" as HIHOKENSHA_jushochitokureiKaijoJiyuCode, HIHOKENSHA."jushochitokureiKaijoYMD" as HIHOKENSHA_jushochitokureiKaijoYMD, HIHOKENSHA."jushochitokureiKaijoTodokedeYMD" as HIHOKENSHA_jushochitokureiKaijoTodokedeYMD, HIHOKENSHA."jushochiTokureiFlag" as HIHOKENSHA_jushochiTokureiFlag, HIHOKENSHA."koikinaiJushochiTokureiFlag" as HIHOKENSHA_koikinaiJushochiTokureiFlag, HIHOKENSHA."koikinaiTokureiSochimotoShichosonCode" as HIHOKENSHA_koikinaiTokureiSochimotoShichosonCode, HIHOKENSHA."kyuShichosonCode" as HIHOKENSHA_kyuShichosonCode, HIHOKENSHA."logicalDeletedFlag" as HIHOKENSHA_logicalDeletedFlag
